scenario_text.value:
*huff*... *huff*... We took them all out,
somehow!

Yeah, I wasn’t sure how it was gonna work out
at first.
Miu! You’re not hurt, are you?!

I’m fine...thanks to Takuma.
Takuma, not YOU, Kaito!
Yeah, what she said!

Ignoring your sister and getting caught up in
a battle! You and Dracumon both suck!
Ugh... My bad...
I’m so ashamed...

If Takuma and Agumon weren’t here, do you
think you would’ve been able to save me?!
I...I might even have died, you know!
Miu... I’m real, real sorry.

Enough already, Miu.
I think he gets the picture.

If you say so, Takuma...
You’d better thank him, Kaito!
Yeah, you’re right.

You really saved us, Takuma, Agumon... I owe
you one for real.
Not good enough! Once more, with feeling!

Seriously, enough, Miu.
Kaito’s shown how he feels about it.
Yeah, even I can tell!
All right, if you say so...

Come on, let’s leave it there for now. We’ve
got to hurry on!

Hurry on... Does that mean Kenzoku have
showed up in other places?!
I can’t say for sure, but...

But Saki ran off to save the little ones
living in the amusement park.
What?! All by herself?!

Aoi, Minoru, and the professor went after
her, so I bet she’s okay. Let’s check though.

Those Kenzoku could be lurking around here
somewhere. I wanna go help. You guys in?
Of course! I won’t let you say no, Kaito.
As if I would!
When in doubt, move out! Let’s go, Takuma!
